twitch_info.title: I Wanna Potato 2.5: Whispers of the Needle Gods - Part 3

message.body: Still love the music of this hub
I'll be more avoidance awake then and should be able to clear it maybe
this does not look fun lmao
if you may be wondering why I'm playing potato 2.5 when I have spare grind time
it's mainly cause I've had it installed for years and wanted to beat it LUL
not far away from its boss
just two zones and then boss
should've seen the hell transition to this hub
and ye that's the other reason this game has cool visuals and music
needle is hard but cool except that one area I minus'd
each area has its own visuals and music which is nice
and its own main gimmick so-to speak
typically the gimmick is in the form of level design
and usually the final save of an area is really hard
this is also a way to help me improve in needle which is nice
ah one of those vine jumps
oh boy this is sure a save LUL
do I have hold right for the diagonal
also the bubbles in the background are neat
I am on pre-final area so makes sense
I could not have baeten this game before K3
cause of the forced jump cancel
only learnt true cancelling cause of K3 LUL
piano music got boring after a while lmao
eating some cookies before I resume xd
forgot this game stutters when music is restarted LUL
I've been lurking for a bit, glad you seemed to have been enjoying it. I have to go now but just wanted to say thanks for playing it and good luck with the rest
I play this every so often when I got grind time free away from K3.
Been wanting to beat this game for years. I downloaded it as far back as 2017 I think it was. LUL
Haven't even been capable of playing it until after I finished K3 platforming.
It's been really cool being able to go back to games I couldn't beat and finally progress in them.
I love how pre-final save was basically free
I like needle as much as I like avoidance tbh
I'm a rare breed in that respect LUL
I don't know what's funnier, the joke itself or that it's your best joke. :thinking:
ok after some technical difficulties I can now make pizza pops :p
with any luck I'll beat this area and reach final area today
well Im afk 3mins don't go beating it before I get back lmao
and to think I had no issues with it earlier
Ill break out the canadian water totem
you wer ehere for that one! :D
this should be easy for you XD
the water pulls you odwn faster than normal gravity in this
all the ost in this game is just
except one area but we don't talk about it
title screen music for final area?
can't say I've ever seen a game do that before
a new I need to sub so we can get some CatJam in here :o
there's more to this ost than I knew
I guess you never stay on title screen long enough to find out huh!
oh wow this needle is nuts
have you looked at the whole save?
you are a madlad nothing changes. :P
love me some good needle like this shit
I need to look into who made Terrorhedron sounds like them tbh
the claymation  shooter called platypus LUL
that game was insane as fuck
did you ever beat that one?
the game crashed at a certain point
if it keeps crashing on ya we can get you a new Win Vista Home Mini :p
This needle is actually hard holy shit
go back to something it was meant to run on lol
or if I had a better pc I could pass a second gpu through in a VM
I need a working win7 vm if I want to play the old danmakufu ph3 and 0.12m games without any framerate drops
so uhh does Bingo mean you got the save and Im behind now or?
no that was in reference to gpu thing
was like "damn your slow today twitch"
we don't have one of those either :o
I mean ofc we don't I haven't set up an affiliate account yet LUL
I have all the requirements massively over fulfilled
well don't make it a prio but custom era emotes and uhhh CatJam
I have to send you a copy of terrorhedron its a 3D tower defense with an almost 1-1 soundtrack
very close to the final boss of this game
yeah we'll see about that lmao
I dont see a way to get up form there but you do
I know its there just out of my power
won't fully believe it till I see it
needle and avoidance require different skill-sets, but they can also be switched between for me
in such a way that my fatigue on one does not impact the other
if I'm too tired on avoidance I can do needle just fine
and that's why I'm playing this game :p
the needle in this gfame is also really good
there was only one bad needle in his game
this save is a really hard one
any save with apples typically is
but the dev confirmed them to beapples
either way we still say cherries sometimes
I had someone try to convince me something in one of your previous games was a loaf of bread
lets just say it wasn't bread :p
and then we're at the boss
I think we can both agree
only one segment of this game wasn't
technically one whole area was also kinda a meme
other than that been a phenomenal game
it'd be even worse if I weren't a K3 platform clearer
without K3 I really wouldn't be able to get this far
there was a forced cancel on previous area
I couldn't do proper cancelling before K3
so I wou ld've been fucked
its been so long what was before K3 again?
spook jam in a good tmie
but I wasn't like able to play games like this at all
I had to make K3 my life in order to make progress
Once I finally became good enough to play K3
I actually played K3 again as a complete joke
and then I was going what the fuck
and then  I cleared secret 1 super fast
WELP I GUESS MY GRIND HAS BEGUN BOIS!
so ye I was competent for sure
good enough to get started on K3
it's funny thinking back on it even though it's still happening
to think like 815+ or so hours ago
not quite right btw, I think my save file had like 69 hours in or something from secret 1 entrance attempts prior to me continuing my playthrough.
so minus the 69 and you'll have how long I've actually been grinding for since I came back
younger era left that time for himself not future era XD
I did consider redoing my save file after to have a better time to be more in line with my current skill
but decided I don't want to do another secret 1 entrance attempt
its like loading up mario world 2 and starting over
who does that without beating the old data XD
not quite as bad as that
It was only barely into stage 1
the reason I cou ldn't play K3 for so long
was I knew that if I couldn't do secret 1 entrance, there was no point playing
it was beating secret 1 entrance that made me go oh yeah 100% should be a thing
I should go to bed LUL
I planned to get ready for bed in like 12 minutes
while you are awake can you confirm that swill is a thing british people actually say
aight the wordle for today is cap
i searched the word and  the definition had british as a tag
It probably was a british word a long time ago
swill is totes british I wanna say more canadian british though and maybe aussy
Apparently it dates from mid 16th century old english
We might actually say swill but I haven't heard anyone say it in such a long time I forgot it was even a thing.
lmfao dont bite my head of jk jk
if britain weren't real then what am I? :thinking:
yes we still have a Queen lmao
but she's head of state, not head of government
we do too his name is justin
actual government is elected by the people and does normal government things
the queen is about as powerful as the pope but that might be giving her too much
I told you this save was something
if they put the vines up a block you could clear the 2nd spike
when I beat a save I make it look easy
Kinker can attest to that LUL
a typical move from era the crowd goes wild
honestly this game is just sooo good
theres no save up there making it sooo much worse
however my time for the night is now up
I do want to go back to this game again, so I probably will after ex piano grinds for like 8+ hours
Ill take crushing silence as a yes
Gonna say today's been good though, I mean no real progress on EX Piano sure
bro i have this chat open like 1/3 of the time im participating in it
I figured as much still thought I'd ask the obvious
it also took me like 5 seconds to process that question
